objective: Document violations of 18 VAC 135-20-60 (quarterly face-to-face supervision)

regulation.title: Quarterly face-to-face supervision certification
regulation.requirement: Requires quarterly face-to-face supervision certification for licensees located more than 50 miles from the principal broker's office

distance_analysis.principal_broker_address: FRISCO, TX 75034 (or 5729 LEBANON RD STE 144553, FRISCO, TX 75034)
distance_analysis.significance: Makes quarterly face-to-face supervision physically impossible

supervision_certification_requirements.requirement: Face-to-face supervision certification must be filed with DPOR

virginia_requirement.requirement: If supervising broker resides more than 50 miles from branch office with active licensees, must certify quarterly in writing that supervision requirements have been met
virginia_requirement.note: Written certification required, but no explicit requirement for quarterly face-to-face meetings

search_methods: Kettler internal records (if accessible via discovery)

logical_analysis.conclusion: While quarterly written certification is required, the 1,300-mile distance makes regular face-to-face supervision impractical and likely not occurring

supervision_logs.note: Supervision logs would require FOIA request to DPOR or discovery in legal proceedings. Logical analysis shows impossibility given 1,300-mile distance.

face_to_face_meeting_violations.logical_impossibility: 1,300-mile distance makes quarterly face-to-face meetings impractical

deliverable: Analysis showing distance violation and lack of supervision certifications
next_steps: Calculate exact distance from Frisco TX to McLean VA
Submit FOIA request to DPOR for supervision certifications
Document lack of face-to-face meeting capability

metadata.source: Kettler Data Analysis Project - VA DPOR Complaint Research
